settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
Gear up for an epic adventure with the Transformers Galaxy Version 03 The Autobot Run! Each box holds a unique surprise – a meticulously crafted character, waiting to be assembled by you.

Build your own Bumblebee, Ultra Magnus (DW), Soundwave(Secret Figure), or any of the other incredible Transformers included in this series. Each figure is designed for a satisfying build and dynamic display, letting you bring the iconic Transformers universe to life right in your own hands.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each surprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Surprise Purchase: Purchasing surprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Surprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase surprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Surprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectables you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy, it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days, according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and on company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Suprise Contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: Bring your favorite Autobots to life with officially licensed figures, capturing the iconic designs and details you love.

Experience the classic Transformers characters in a whole new way with unique designs and poses, capturing the spirit of the original series with a fresh twist. These highly detailed and affordable figures are perfect for any serious collector, adding a unique touch to your collection.
Each figure comes with a variety of accessories, adding even more detail to your collection. And the best part? Each box is a surprise! Which figure will you get?
Unleash dynamic poses with up to 20+ points of articulation, allowing you to recreate epic battle scenes and showcase your favorite Autobots in action.

Celebrate the 40th anniversary of Transformers with these special edition figures, commemorating the iconic legacy of this beloved franchise. Each figure comes with a variety of accessories, adding even more detail to your collection and allowing you to customize your display.

settings.heading: Come gather your Cybertron Army
settings.context: The Autobots are on the move! A mysterious threat has emerged, and it's up to these brave heroes to stop it. But they can't do it alone. Each figure is meticulously designed for a satisfying building experience and dynamic displays. Collect them all and create your own epic battles. Come gather your Cybertron Army and join the fight!

Transformers Galaxy Version 03 The Autobot Run
10 yrs and above
ABS Environmentally friendly plastic
The package of the single box contains one Blokees Transformers figure. It could randomly be a basic figure or a special figure.

settings.block_text_02: Disguise: Truck.Height: 6 meters.Strengths: Wisdom, valor, leadership.Weaknesses: Can be too trusting.Features: His axe is so sharp, it can cut through anything.
Disguise: Van.Height: 5 meters.Strengths: Strength, courage, loyalty.Weaknesses: Can be a bit hot-headed.Features: He will fight to the bitter end, bringing his enemies down with him.
The probability of receiving each Transformers is marked under each action figure. For example: 1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, 1 is a secret figure.

settings.heading: The Autobot Run Building Figures : Build Your Autobot Army!
settings.text: The Autobot Run brings you iconic Autobot heroes, like Bumblebee, Ultra Magnus (DW), and Slag, ready to be built and displayed. Each figure features meticulous detail, high-quality ABS plastic construction, and multiple points of articulation for dynamic poses.  Add a thrilling element to your collection with the surprise box – which figure will you get? Collect them all and join the Autobot Run!

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers: The Ultimate Autobot Challenge

settings.title: Gamer Girl
settings.context: The secret Soundwave figure is amazing! It's so cool to have a special edition figure that's not available in stores. The details on the figure are incredible, and the assembly is smooth and satisfying. A must-have for any Transformers fan!

settings.title: Safety First Mom
settings.context: Red Alert is a great choice for parents who want a safe and durable toy for their kids. The figure is made with high-quality, non-toxic materials, and the assembly is easy for little hands to manage. My kids love the details on the figure, and the articulation is perfect for recreating scenes from the movies. A great way to introduce kids to the world of Transformers!

settings.title: Mystery Mania
settings.context: Opening a surprise box from the Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run series is always a thrill! The anticipation of discovering which Autobot is inside adds an exciting element to each purchase. The figures are consistently high quality with amazing detail and articulation. It's a fantastic way to gradually build your collection.

settings.title: Value Seeker Mom
settings.context: I purchased the whole box to save on cost, and it's been a great investment for my kids. Each figure is durable and safe, made with non-toxic materials. The variety keeps my children entertained for hours, and the quality ensures these toys will last. It's a fantastic buy for any parent looking to get the most bang for their buck.

settings.title: Surprise Box Addict
settings.context: There's something magical about the surprise boxes from the Blokees The Autobot Run. Each one is a mini adventure, and the joy of unboxing never gets old. The figures are always a delightful surprise, with top-notch detailing and build quality. Perfect for those who love a good mystery!

settings.title: The Detailed Collector
settings.context: The whole box set of Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run is a dream come true for detail enthusiasts. Each figure is crafted with precision, capturing the essence of the characters perfectly. The articulation allows for dynamic poses, making them ideal for display. It's clear that a lot of care went into designing these figures.

settings.title: Frugal Dad
settings.context: The surprise boxes are a fantastic option for those on a budget. Each box is affordable and offers a high-quality figure that feels like a premium product. My kids love the surprise element, and I appreciate not having to spend a fortune on a great toy. Highly recommended for budget-conscious families.

settings.title: Teacher Toys
settings.context: I use the surprise boxes from the Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run series as rewards in my classroom. The element of surprise keeps the students motivated, and the quality of the figures ensures they last throughout the school year. They're a fantastic tool for encouraging positive behavior and engagement.

settings.title: Creative Kid
settings.context: I love the surprise boxes because they inspire my creativity. Each figure I unbox gives me new ideas for stories and drawings. The figures are so detailed and cool, and I can't wait to see which one I get next. It's like getting a new piece of art every time!

settings.title: Green Living
settings.context: I appreciate that the Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures are made with non-toxic materials and are built to last. Whether you buy the whole box or a surprise box, you're getting a product that's environmentally conscious. It's great to see a toy company that cares about sustainability.

settings.title: Gift Guru
settings.context: I bought a whole box of Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run for my nephew's birthday, and it was a hit! The variety of figures ensured that he had plenty to play with, and the quality is superb. For those looking to give an unforgettable gift, the whole box is the way to go.

settings.block_title: What's special about the surprise figure in the Galaxy Version 03 The Autobot Run?
settings.block_text: The special figure in this series comes decked out in a stunning metallic paint finish, giving it a premium look with enhanced spray paint details and intricate printing. It's a highly coveted collectible, produced in a rare ratio of 1:36. Get ready to hunt for this gem!

settings.block_title: Are Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures durable for rough play?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures are built tough for all kinds of adventures. Crafted from high-quality ABS plastic, these figures can handle the rough and tumble of playtime and are designed to last.

settings.block_title: Can Blokees Transformers blocks transform into vehicles?
settings.block_text: While our Transformers blocks are all about dynamic building and striking poses, they don't transform into vehicles. They’re designed to spark your creativity and provide an imaginative play experience like no other.

settings.block_title: What material are Blokees Transformers figures made of, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures are made from top-notch ABS plastic. They undergo rigorous testing and meet EU CE, EU RoHS, and Swiss SGS standards, ensuring they're safe, durable, and environmentally friendly.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run?
settings.block_text: The Autobot Run is perfect for kids aged 10 and up. It offers a blend of fun, creativity, and a bit of a challenge, making it ideal for growing minds.

settings.block_title: How do I assemble Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures?
settings.block_text: Assembling Blokees Transformers The Autobot Run figures is a breeze! Just snap together the pre-cut ABS pieces following the simple instructions included. No need for glue, brushes, or cutters. It’s quick, easy, and fun!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
